item.title: DayZ Standalone
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:75, topic:481663”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=599902.msg4447423#msg4447423 date=1409581108]
I’ve been watching a lot of FrankieonPCin1080p playing this, it seems really fun besides a lot of the glitches and issues you guys have already mentioned. It seems really shit though that 95% of all players are only interested in perching up on a mountain and sniping down into the cities.

Survive The Night! has a very cool system that involves your mental health, which they probably implemented to combat the overwhelming bandit type gameplay in their game once it is released. If DayZ had a system to balance player interactions to at least force the player killers to play survival or even assist players to keep their “sanity” or something, I bet a lot more people would be willing to play.

Right now it seems pointless unless you have a clan.
[/quote]
http://reddit.com/r/RedditRescueForce

need I say more? I play as a hero and help people who post in there, you avoid PvP, get good interaction and get to play your desired role. No snipers sitting with their arse plonked on a brick and a Mosin pointed at your chops.[/quote]
Ok this is cool :P. I’ve seen Frankie do some stuff like that, but wasn’t aware there was a whole reddit community based around it.

Read full topic

Survive The Night! has a very cool system that involves your mental health, which they probably implemented to combat the overwhelming bandit type gameplay in their game once it is released. item.title: DayZ Standalone
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

I’ve been watching a lot of FrankieonPCin1080p playing this, it seems really fun besides a lot of the glitches and issues you guys have already mentioned. It seems really shit though that 95% of all players are only interested in perching up on a mountain and sniping down into the cities.

Survive The Night! has a very cool system that involves your mental health, which they probably implemented to combat the overwhelming bandit type gameplay in their game once it is released. If DayZ had a system to balance player interactions to at least force the player killers to play survival or even assist players to keep their “sanity” or something, I bet a lot more people would be willing to play.

Right now it seems pointless unless you have a clan.

Read full topic

item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

If they fix the zombies going through doors and fall damage, I’d probably play alot more. I’d like to be able to run into a room and shut the door, without having to worry about the zombie coming through, as well as not jump off a 6ft ledge and die on impact…

Read full topic

item.title: DayZ Standalone
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:69, topic:481663”][quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=599902.msg4446433#msg4446433 date=1409065593]
a full server shouldn’t have the issue of never finding someone, especially when you head into a city like berezino or northwest airfield. and the AI sucks, you can pull them from miles away when technically they cannot even see you. plus, the claimed to have fixed zombies through walls, but it still happens where they run through walls, fences, doors, etc.
[/quote]
On a full server if you don’t meet anyone in berezino or the NWAF that’s incredible because I always do, I literally live in the NWAF and have done for the past 2 months on this character lol. Zombies don’t run through walls or anything now, that really shouldn’t be happening. Myself or anyone else on reddit hasn’t noticed it anyway, maybe it’s an issue with your installation?[/quote]we’ll find out next time i play, it’s a fresh install on the new computer. i’ve been to berezino and NWAF on full servers multiple times and never met a soul, so i guess we have to go with luck.

also, i’ve watched streamers deal with continuing zombies running through objects, so i find it hard to believe they truly fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: DayZ Standalone
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

iCreatedHorror:

a full server shouldn’t have the issue of never finding someone, especially when you head into a city like berezino or northwest airfield. and the AI sucks, you can pull them from miles away when technically they cannot even see you. plus, the claimed to have fixed zombies through walls, but it still happens where they run through walls, fences, doors, etc.

On a full server if you don’t meet anyone in berezino or the NWAF that’s incredible because I always do, I literally live in the NWAF and have done for the past 2 months on this character lol. Zombies don’t run through walls or anything now, that really shouldn’t be happening. Myself or anyone else on reddit hasn’t noticed it anyway, maybe it’s an issue with your installation?

Read full topic

item.title: DayZ Standalone
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

iCreatedHorror:

the biggest problems i have is that hackers run free, zombies are ‘rare’, zombie AI is garbage, the game is taking forever to get anywhere, and even on fully populated servers you can go forever without finding someone.

There’s no real problem with the zombie AI. It’s just with a map like in DayZ you can see/hear them a mile away, and kill them easily if you’re armed. The game is wholly unfinished though. Just tons of bugs in nearly every feature it seems. That’s the most annoying thing for me. And not just minor bugs, I’ve had a couple times where my character just got reset entirely so I lost all my gear and everything that I spent 4 hours getting gear. As far as going forever without finding someone, that’s just the style of the game. Survival RPGs, especially zombie survivals, are meant to be tedious yet rewarding. It’s an open world, what do you expect. So nothing wrong with the game structure there.

Read full topic

RUNE-PK:

I haven’t played it yet is it a fun game or kinda boring, like how long does it take to find zombies and weapons…(etc) I have no idea I wanna play it but I wanna know if its worth it?

It is the greatest game ever created. It’s grindy but the best thing you’ll ever play with a group.
